name: yaml-scene
description: Do everything with yaml scenario file

scripts.dev1: npx nodemon --watch src --watch test --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js --inspect-brk src/elements/Doc/index.ts'
scripts.dev: npx nodemon --watch src --watch test --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js --inspect-brk src/index.ts -e 'YOUTUBEURL=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D7r_Wuwf47I' --env-file 'yaml-test/.env' yaml-test/index.yaml'
scripts.start: npx nodemon --watch src --watch test --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js src/index.ts --env-file 'yaml-test/.env' /Users/doanthuanthanh/code/github/yaml-scene/yaml-test/examples/download_youtube.yaml'
scripts.build:test: yarn build && yarn global upgrade yaml-scene
scripts.build1: yarn clean && yarn build:only && node bin/expose_example.js
scripts.docker:pub: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -t doanthuanthanh88/testapi6 . --push && docker pull doanthuanthanh88/testapi6
